Question: In October 1954 this person received the Nobel Prize in Literature.
Hints: Ernest Miller **** (July 21, 1899 – July 2, 1961) was an American author and journalist.
In the late spring this person and Pauline traveled to Kansas City, where their son Patrick was born on June 28, 1928.
His third son, Gregory Hancock ****, was born a year later on November 12, 1931 in Kansas City.
